author: .paulharris
content:
I was looking at graffiti watermarks again if anyone interested...
```
Slots: 1225121
Without watermarks: 72.28% (885492)
including watermarks: 27.72% (339629)

CL CLients found:
LH 52.41% (178016)
LS 2.44% (8296)
TK 45.14% (153317)

EL Clients found:
GE 47.14% (160088)
RH 2.21% (7513)
BU 16.49% (56011)
EG 0.16% (548)
NM 34.00% (115469)
```
I'm just running on a minimal node, and the included rate is fairly low, but given i generated it i'll share. 
It's fairly low quality data given the included rate and clear bias towards a small number defaulting watermarking to on.
